bool nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::addEmitter ( const std::string &  emitterName)

addEmitter:

Add an Emitter to THIS ParticleMesh

Parameters:
[in]emitterName/ Emitter 's name to be added to THIS ParticleMesh
Returns:
: True if the emitter was added. False if the emitter could not be added becase it is not compatible or already existed.

Builds the ParticleMesh

const unsigned int &  seed 
)

fracture:

Break the mesh into pieces.

Parameters:
[in]numberOfPieces/ Number of pieces after the breaking process.
[in]seed/ Random seed used for the breaking process.
Returns:
: MultiBody with the resulting pieces.
template<class X >
X nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::getEmitterParameter ( const std::string &  emitterName,
const std::string &  paramName 
)

getEmitterParameter:

Gets the value of the emitter's Parameter given by its name( name ). As this is a templatized method you would need to indicate the type of the parameter. Example: int valueParameter = thisNode.getEmitterParameter<int>( "nameParameter" );

Parameters:
[in]emitterName/ emitter's name
[in]paramName/ emitter's parameter name
Returns:
: emitter's parameter value
NL_INT nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::getEmitterParameterType ( const std::string &  emitterName,
const std::string &  paramName 
)

getEmitterParameterType:

Gets the emitter's Parameter type given by its name( paramName ).

Parameters:
[in]emitterName/ emitter's name
[in]paramName/ emitter's parameter name
Returns:
: emitter's parameter type, values in [ float , double , std::vector[int] , int , bool , Vector , Color ]
  • If the emitter has not a parameter with name ( paramName ) then it return -1;
void nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::getEmitters ( std::vector< std::string > &  emitterNames)

getEmitters:

Get Emitters 's names that contribute to create THIS ParticleMesh

Parameters:
[out]emitterNames/ Vector of Emitters 's names

void nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::sdkExport ( void  )

Writes out all the resources that are active in the export central

void nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::setEmitterParameter ( const std::string &  emitterName,
const std::string &  paramName,
const int &  value 
)

setEmitterParameter:

Sets the emitter's Parameter value given by its name( name ). The parameter name is the one that can be seen in the user interface. It is not case sensitive. The value can be any type that is accepted for the parameters in the user interface. Care must be taken when using this function about the type of the values and the parameter names, a hard type and name check is done reporting the corresponding errors to the user in any case.

Parameters:
[in]emitterName/ emitter's name
[in]paramName/ emitter's parameter name
[in]value/ emitter's parameter new value
void nextlimit::rf_sdk::ParticleMesh::setEmitterParameter ( const std::string &  emitterName,
const std::string &  paramName,
const float &  value 
)
